ctx: intros l i a b Hsorted Hcontig.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros l i a b Hsorted Hcontig. split. - destruct Hsorted as [Hhead Hsorted_tail]. specialize (Hhead b). assert (In b (b :: l)) by (apply in_eq). apply Hhead in H. destruct H as [Hindex _]. auto. - destruct Hcontig as [_ Hindex_lo]. specialize (Hindex_lo a). assert (In a (a :: b :: l)) by (apply in_eq). apply Hindex_lo in H. auto.
